episodes.title: Karen Wheaton and The Ramp Cult
episodes.description: I had so many survivors reach out, and I wanted to make sure I gave them the time and respect they deserved. Join me this episode for a super special guest and cult survivor, Denise, as she shares her story of growing up in the cult mentality and how she has finally become free as a shameless individual and fellow member of the LGBTQ+ community! Dont forget to follow us on all socials and other streaming platforms! TikTok: tiktok.com/@backinthacloset (http://tiktok.com/@backinthacloset) (http://tiktok.com/@backinthacloset) (http://tiktok.com/@backinthacloset) Insta: https://www.instagram.com/backinthacloset?igsh=MTc2M2NhamZuZmF3bg%3D%3D&utm_source=qr Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/0mlETcvnLXW0X5WDvl7Jdv Apple Podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/back-in-tha-closet/id1793227666 The views, statements, and opinions expressed in this video are solely those held by the host and guests of Back in tha Closet. They do not in any way represent the views, statements, and opinions of The Ramp, Karen Wheaton, or Church of the Highlands and all of their affiliates. Also, all of these views, statements, and opinions are alleged and not proven or denied by either Back in tha Closet or The Ramp, Karen Wheaton, and Church of the Highlands and all of its affiliates.

episodes.title: Cult Pastor Steps Down
episodes.description:
Come back, back, back inside our cozy little closet! We have a lot to discuss today. Cult pastor Chris Hodges steps down from megachurch Church of the Highlands, we take a look at some crazy grindr messages, and Mrs. Weasley of the Harry Potter franchise possesses one of our hosts. Anyway, please subscribe so I can be rich. Thanks for your generous donation.
Dont forget to follow us on all socials and other streaming platforms!
